PostCombat_HarperScout_001.synopsis: Meygan thanks the player after they fought off some Shadow cursed creatures, and offers to lead the way to a safe place (last light inn). She's one of several harper scouts who may deliver variants on this dialogue, depending on who is alive.

AD_HarperScout_000_Combat.how_to_trigger: Trigger the fight between the Driders and the Harpers in SCL

AD_HarperScout_001_WrongWarning.synopsis: After saving them from shadow creatures, the Harper Scouts are guiding the player through SCL to Last Light.This AD plays if the player goes in the wrong direction.

AD_HarperScout_001_Combat.how_to_trigger: Trigger the fight between the Driders and the Harpers in SCL

AD_HarperScout000_ExplainShadows.synopsis: AD of Harper Lassandra explaining the shadow curse in brief while in combat against the shadows.
AD_HarperScout000_ExplainShadows.how_to_trigger: Help the harper scouts fight the shadows.

PostCombat_HarperScout_003.synopsis: Carrow, a harper scout, urges the player to come with him after they survived a fight with some shadow-cursed creatures. He says there's a safe place nearby. Quick, urgent 'let's get out of here' dialogue.
PostCombat_HarperScout_003.how_to_trigger: Go to Region Act 2: SCLgod ongoto 70.86, 51.35, 162.40approach the  Camp fire -> trigger SCL_HarperScouts_ShadowCreaturesenter combat  -> kill other Harper besides Karrow -> killcombattalk to Harper Karrow

BridgePoint_000.synopsis: Lassandra's default dialogue at the bridge to Last Light while waiting for the player to speak to Jaheira.
BridgePoint_000.how_to_trigger: 1. goto 59; 47; 1552. Go through the scene and kill the shadows3. Follow the harpers to haven4. Talk to Lassandra

AD_HarperScout_003_Combat.synopsis: Combat AD for Harper Karrow in SCL
AD_HarperScout_003_Combat.how_to_trigger: Trigger the fight between the Driders and the Harpers in SCL

PostCombat_HarperScout_000.synopsis: Lassandra urges the player to come with them to the Last Light Inn after they survive a fight against the shadow-cursed.
PostCombat_HarperScout_000.how_to_trigger: Go to Region Act 2: SCLgod ongoto 70.86, 51.35, 162.40approach the  Camp fire -> trigger SCL_HarperScouts_ShadowCreaturesenter combat  -> killcombattalk to Harper Lassandra

AD_HarperScout_003_LeaveWarning.synopsis: After saving the Harper Scouts from the Shadow creatures in SCL, the player tries to leave without telling the Harpers they're ready to go.

ShadowCreatures.synopsis: The player encounters a group of Harper scouts shortly after entering the Shadow-cursed lands. After being challenged by the scouts, they're forced to join sides as they're attacked by shadow creatures.

AD_HarperScout_000_LeaveWarning.synopsis: After saving the Harper Scouts from the Shadow creatures in SCL, the player tries to leave without telling the Harpers they're ready to go.

Dead_HarperScout_000.synopsis: Speak with dead dialogue with Lassandra, a harper scout. The player can ask her corpse, who she is, what she was doing etc, possibly learning of Last Light, a nearby refuge against shadow curse.
Dead_HarperScout_000.how_to_trigger: Use speak with dead on Lassandra's corpse.

AD_HarperScout_001_LeaveWarning.synopsis: After saving the Harper Scouts from the Shadow creatures in SCL, the player tries to leave without telling the Harpers they're ready to go.

AD_HarperScout_000_Combat3.how_to_trigger: Trigger the fight between the Driders and the Harpers in SCL

AD_HarperScout_000_WrongWarning.synopsis: After saving them from shadow creatures, the Harper Scouts are guiding the player through SCL to Last Light.This AD plays if the player goes in the wrong direction.

AD_HarperScout_003_WrongWarning.synopsis: After saving them from shadow creatures, the Harper Scouts are guiding the player through SCL to Last Light.This AD plays if the player goes in the wrong direction.

BridgePoint_003.how_to_trigger: 1. goto 59; 47; 1552. Go through the scene and kill the shadows3. Follow the harpers to haven4. Talk to Karrow

AD_HarperScout_000.synopsis: Brief AD when player first spots the harpers to establish their presence before the big dialogue.

BridgePoint_001.synopsis: Default dialogue for Meygan once they reach the bridge into the Last Light, before the player's spoken to Jaheira.
BridgePoint_001.how_to_trigger: 1. goto 59; 47; 1552. Go through the scene and kill the shadows3. Follow the harpers to haven4. Talk to Meygan

PostCombat_HarperScout_001_6.speaker: Harper Meygan
PostCombat_HarperScout_001_6.text: You can't just wander off! Stick with me, I'll show you the way.

PostCombat_HarperScout_001_10.speaker: Harper Meygan
PostCombat_HarperScout_001_10.text: Thank you... wouldn't have made it without your help.

PostCombat_HarperScout_001_4.speaker: Harper Meygan
PostCombat_HarperScout_001_4.text: We need to get out of here. There's a safe place - follow me.

PostCombat_HarperScout_001_5.speaker: Harper Meygan
PostCombat_HarperScout_001_5.text: Stay close, and try avoid the shadows.

PostCombat_HarperScout_001_1.speaker: Harper Meygan
PostCombat_HarperScout_001_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: One last glance over the area where the battle was just fought.NodeContext: Spoken softly during once last glance over the battlefield before leaving (Yonas = comrade killed at the start of the fight, also her lover)

PostCombat_HarperScout_001_3.speaker: Harper Meygan
PostCombat_HarperScout_001_3.text: Be quick. You don't want to linger here, trust me.

AD_HarperScout_000_Combat_0.speaker: Harper Lassandra
AD_HarperScout_000_Combat_0.text: Cut the beast down! Take its light!

AD_HarperScout_001_WrongWarning_0.speaker: Harper Meygan
AD_HarperScout_001_WrongWarning_0.text: Where are you going? That's not the way to Last Light.

AD_HarperScout_001_Combat_0.speaker: Harper Meygan
AD_HarperScout_001_Combat_0.text: Shit - the shadows took Yonas. Make every strike count!

AD_HarperScout000_ExplainShadows_0.speaker: Harper Lassandra
AD_HarperScout000_ExplainShadows_0.text: The shadows are cursed - either keep away from them or destroy them with light!

PostCombat_HarperScout_003_0.speaker: Harper Karrow
PostCombat_HarperScout_003_0.text: Hurry up - more of them will be on us any moment.

PostCombat_HarperScout_003_6.speaker: Harper Karrow
PostCombat_HarperScout_003_6.text: This is no place for a wander. Stay by me, I know the path.

PostCombat_HarperScout_003_9.speaker: Harper Karrow
PostCombat_HarperScout_003_9.text: Nicely fought. You've got some chops.

PostCombat_HarperScout_003_4.speaker: Harper Karrow
PostCombat_HarperScout_003_4.text: More will be here soon. We need to go - there's a place nearby.

PostCombat_HarperScout_003_1.speaker: Harper Karrow
PostCombat_HarperScout_003_1.text: Make it quick. Waiting'll get us killed.

BridgePoint_000_0.speaker: Harper Lassandra
BridgePoint_000_0.text: Go into the light - unless you fancy your chances in the shadows where we found you.

BridgePoint_000_1.speaker: Harper Lassandra
BridgePoint_000_1.text: Head on in. Our leader'll want a word.

AD_HarperScout_003_Combat_0.speaker: Harper Karrow
AD_HarperScout_003_Combat_0.text: Yonas, no! What are you doing?

PostCombat_HarperScout_000_3.speaker: Harper Lassandra
PostCombat_HarperScout_000_3.text: Not such a freak after all. I know a safe place - let me mark it on your map.

PostCombat_HarperScout_000_1.speaker: Harper Lassandra
PostCombat_HarperScout_000_1.text: Keep your torch high - if you step into the shadows, you'll be felled in a heartbeat.

PostCombat_HarperScout_000_9.speaker: Player
PostCombat_HarperScout_000_9.text: 'Safe place'? You mean somewhere the shadows can't penetrate?

PostCombat_HarperScout_000_2.speaker: Harper Lassandra
PostCombat_HarperScout_000_2.text: That's right - protected by magic. Only spot in the region that's not been swallowed up by this damn curse. Light'll save you here on the outskirts, but a few paces deeper and you're screwed.

PostCombat_HarperScout_000_0.speaker: Harper Lassandra
PostCombat_HarperScout_000_0.text: If you want to catch your breath, the inn's the only place to do it. Hope to see you there.

PostCombat_HarperScout_000_7.speaker: Harper Lassandra
PostCombat_HarperScout_000_7.context: NodeContext: Shouted to her crew to head home.

PostCombat_HarperScout_000_8.speaker: Harper Lassandra
PostCombat_HarperScout_000_8.text: Remember: stay in the light or you're done for.

PostCombat_HarperScout_000_6.speaker: Player
PostCombat_HarperScout_000_6.text: Thanks, but I'm heading to Moonrise Towers.

PostCombat_HarperScout_000_11.speaker: Harper Lassandra
PostCombat_HarperScout_000_11.text: Your funeral. Far as we can tell, there's no way through.
PostCombat_HarperScout_000_11.context: NodeContext: Second part 'Harpers - move out!' is to her contingent. Could be said almost over her shoulder.

PostCombat_HarperScout_000_10.speaker: Harper Lassandra
PostCombat_HarperScout_000_10.text: The shadows'll get you eventually, the deeper in you go. Keep to the light to buy yourself some time.

PostCombat_HarperScout_000_4.speaker: Harper Lassandra
PostCombat_HarperScout_000_4.text: There's no time to mourn the others - we have to move. I know a safe space. Let me mark it on your map.

PostCombat_HarperScout_000_13.speaker: Harper Lassandra
PostCombat_HarperScout_000_13.text: Well done - now we've got to move. I know a safe place - give me your map.

ShadowCreatures_5.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_5.text: Keep in the light! You - who the hells are you?!
ShadowCreatures_5.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player has leroy jenkins'd into the scene by jumping off a high precipice from above, landing amidst the Harpers, who jump back in surprise, and regroup away from the player, so that the player is in a more 'standard' dialogue position at the end of the node. Lassandra gathers her wits immediately after her intiial shock and addresses the Harpers, afraid they've leapt into the darkness. Points weapon at player .NodeContext: 'Keep in the light' is to her HArpers. Address is to player. She points her sword at the player, ready to strike in an instant if necessary.

ShadowCreatures_10.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sword still pointed at player.

ShadowCreatures_21.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_21.text: Stay together! Keep to the light!
ShadowCreatures_21.context: CinematicNodeContext: From off-screen, as the player picks their way carefully through the dark, twisted terrain.

ShadowCreatures_40.context: CinematicNodeContext: In the darkness nearby, burning torches grow near, silhouetting a small knot of armed figures moving in a tight huddle. The player moves closer. A dead branch snaps underfoot, startling one of the figures - Lassandra, a wide-eyed young woman wearing half-plate under a blue cloak. She brandishes a torch and sword.

ShadowCreatures_78.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_78.context: CinematicNodeContext: Yonas (Harper 3) is moving wide of the group, an arrow notched to his bow, eyes fixed on the player. He's straying further from the Harpers' torches, walking along a sharp incline where road falls away, toeing the line between shadow and light.

ShadowCreatures_2.speaker: Player
ShadowCreatures_2.text: My name is [GEN_PlayerName_c11eee1e-7815-6143-7233-f2427799fa53]. Who are you?

ShadowCreatures_28.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_28.context: CinematicNodeContext: *Lassandra keeps her weapon raised. The male harper (Harper 3) inches around, arrow notched, to get a better angle on the player.*NodeContext: Suspicious

ShadowCreatures_48.speaker: Player
ShadowCreatures_48.text: An escaped lunatic. Be careful, or the madman will take over...

ShadowCreatures_36.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_36.context: CinematicNodeContext: *Lassandra keeps her weapon raised. The male harper (Harper 3) inches around, arrow notched, to get a better angle on the player.*NodeContext: Player is being really weird and LAssandra is responding with profound suspicion.

ShadowCreatures_3.speaker: Player
ShadowCreatures_3.text: Someone who will snap both you and your weapons in two unless you lower them.

ShadowCreatures_8.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_8.text: Not taking requests, love. Now put your hands up and walk over here - slowly.
ShadowCreatures_8.context: CinematicNodeContext: *Lassandra keeps her weapon raised. The male harper (Harper 3) inches around, arrow notched, to get a better angle on the player.*

ShadowCreatures_15.speaker: Player
ShadowCreatures_15.text: I am but a simple monk - I am no threat.

ShadowCreatures_63.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_63.text: I saw a 'simple monk' break a fella's spine once - hands where I can see them.

ShadowCreatures_64.speaker: Player
ShadowCreatures_64.text: I'm a sorcerer, so kindly lower your weapons or things might get ugly. Very ugly.

ShadowCreatures_30.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_30.text: So you can fry us alive? I don't think so. Come into the light - hands high.

ShadowCreatures_38.speaker: Player
ShadowCreatures_38.text: A ranger who knows the marks of a hunting party - what are you tracking?

ShadowCreatures_12.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_12.text: It'll be you unless you show yourself. Come out - slowly.

ShadowCreatures_74.speaker: Player
ShadowCreatures_74.text: I find the best introductions are made while sitting around a fire, perhaps with drinks?

ShadowCreatures_23.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_23.text: You're a chatty shadow, I'll give you that. Come out into the light - hands high.
ShadowCreatures_23.context: NodeContext: suspicious but the barest hint of amusement in the first line

ShadowCreatures_37.speaker: Player
ShadowCreatures_37.text: Peace - I am a druid. This land and its festering shadows - what do you know of it?

ShadowCreatures_24.speaker: Player
ShadowCreatures_24.text: An expert in magic. Perhaps I can aid you in traversing this darkness. What do you know of it?

ShadowCreatures_71.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_71.text: Enough not to trust a voice from the darkness. Come into the light - hands high.

ShadowCreatures_51.speaker: Player
ShadowCreatures_51.text: A paladin - one who will only take you down if you're foolish enough to strike first.

ShadowCreatures_29.speaker: Player
ShadowCreatures_29.text: One who has sworn an oath to do no harm. Lower your weapons, please.

ShadowCreatures_27.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_27.text: Whether we attack or not depends entirely on you, love. Come into the light - hands high.

ShadowCreatures_70.speaker: Player
ShadowCreatures_70.text: Back away from them, palms up.

ShadowCreatures_17.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_17.text: Wrong direction. Come into the light, hands high.
ShadowCreatures_17.context: CinematicNodeContext: *Lassandra keeps her weapon raised. The male harper (Harper 3) inches around, arrow notched, to get a better angle on the player.*

ShadowCreatures_73.speaker: Player
ShadowCreatures_73.text: [GEN_PlayerName_c11eee1e-7815-6143-7233-f2427799fa53]. Warrior-at-arms. I mean you no harm.

ShadowCreatures_1.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_1.text: I'll be the judge of that. Stow your weapons, put your hands up, and walk into the light - slowly.
ShadowCreatures_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: *Lassandra keeps her weapon raised. The male harper (Harper 3) inches around, arrow notched, to get a better angle on the player.*NodeContext: Aggressive - warning the player

ShadowCreatures_76.context: CinematicNodeContext: *Something seems to dance in the gloom behind Harper 3's head for the faintest moment. A sadowy shape.*

ShadowCreatures_60.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Yonas notices something behind him and twists to face this new threat, but it's already close and reaching for him. He stumbles to the side, tripping over a root as he tries to dodge a reaching claw, and tumbles down the incline, disappearing into the darkness. [The reaching claw can be cut for cinematic simplicity, the core of it is: "Yonas sees thing, gets spooked, falls down the incline and out of sight.]

ShadowCreatures_16.speaker: Harper Meygan
ShadowCreatures_16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Yonas notices something behind him and twists to face this new threat, but it's already close and reaching for him. He stumbles to the side, tripping over a root as he tries to dodge a reaching claw, and tumbles down the incline, disappearing into the darkness. [The reaching claw can be cut for cinematic simplicity, the core of it is: "Yonas sees thing, gets spooked, falls down the incline and out of sight.]NodeContext: Meygan notices the tentacle. Sudden shriek of alarm.

ShadowCreatures_81.speaker: Harper Meygan
ShadowCreatures_81.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lassandra and Megyn run over to the incline, torches held out, peering into the dark.

ShadowCreatures_55.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_55.text: Yonas? Can you see our torches?
ShadowCreatures_55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Megyn starts forward, but Lassandra holds out a hand to stop her.

ShadowCreatures_41.speaker: Harper Yonas
ShadowCreatures_41.text: I can't see anything. Something's wrong.
ShadowCreatures_41.context: NodeContext: Pained grunt in the middle, like he's being injured by the curse.

ShadowCreatures_46.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_46.text: Follow my voice. Come back to the light.

ShadowCreatures_43.speaker: Harper Yonas
ShadowCreatures_43.text: Who's there? Meg? Is that - argh!
ShadowCreatures_43.context: NodeContext: Pained; he's being transformed inside the curse.

ShadowCreatures_13.speaker: Harper Meygan
ShadowCreatures_13.context: CinematicNodeContext: A shape moves in the shadows, slowly approachingNodeContext: quietly

ShadowCreatures_34.speaker: Harper Yonas
ShadowCreatures_34.text: There you are... Come... Join me...
ShadowCreatures_34.context: NodeContext: Shadowcursed now. A horrible zombified version of himself

ShadowCreatures_47.speaker: Harper Meygan
ShadowCreatures_47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Meygan is holding a torchNodeContext: Horror in her voice

ShadowCreatures_53.speaker: Player
ShadowCreatures_53.text: Try to save them, get ready to fight.

ShadowCreatures_57.speaker: Player
ShadowCreatures_57.text: Move. I'll take care of this.

ShadowCreatures_20.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_20.text: Don't let it get hold of you. Harpers - now!
ShadowCreatures_20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Yonas gives Tav a demonic scowl and advances on them instead.NodeContext: Urgent, creature is approaching player. Gestures to troops to attack creature.

ShadowCreatures_59.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_59.context: NodeContext: Shouted to her troops before battle

ShadowCreatures_45.speaker: Player
ShadowCreatures_45.text: Guards up, everyone. I'm not letting the shadows take anyone else today.

ShadowCreatures_39.speaker: Player
ShadowCreatures_39.text: I'm afraid poor Yonas is bait - and this is a trap.

ShadowCreatures_80.speaker: Player
ShadowCreatures_80.text: Stop your mewling - it's time to fight or die. Choose.

ShadowCreatures_69.speaker: Player
ShadowCreatures_69.text: This darkness is no natural plight - we must fight, or succumb to it too.

ShadowCreatures_65.speaker: Player
ShadowCreatures_65.text: Get behind me - I'll protect you.

ShadowCreatures_79.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_79.text: Not our style. Harpers - to arms!
ShadowCreatures_79.context: NodeContext: Shouted to her troops before battle (combat) first line is said to player, second to the harpers

ShadowCreatures_35.speaker: Player
ShadowCreatures_35.text: Yonas is gone. All that remains is a monster - one I intend to kill.

ShadowCreatures_9.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_9.text: Harpers - you heard them. TO ARMS!
ShadowCreatures_9.context: NodeContext: Shouted to her troops before battle

ShadowCreatures_7.speaker: Player
ShadowCreatures_7.text: His soul... consumed by the darkness. Not a good sign.

ShadowCreatures_18.speaker: Player
ShadowCreatures_18.text: The darkness can force rapid transfiguration? What magic is this?

ShadowCreatures_66.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_66.text: Now is not the time. Harpers, to arms!
ShadowCreatures_66.context: NodeContext: Shouted to her troops before battle (combat) first line is said to player, second to the harpers

ShadowCreatures_25.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_25.text: Step out of the light and you're done for, freak. Fight with us or die in the dark. To arms! Now!
ShadowCreatures_25.context: NodeContext: Grim determination, then a shout to her troops

ShadowCreatures_77.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_77.text: Step out of the light and you're done for. It's fight or die. To arms! Now!
ShadowCreatures_77.context: NodeContext: Grim determination, then a shout to her troops

ShadowCreatures_61.speaker: Player
ShadowCreatures_61.text: I am but a faithful adherent - I do not wish to fight you.

ShadowCreatures_49.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Yonas (Harper 3) is moving wide of the group, an arrow notched to his bow, eyes fixed on the player. He's straying further from the Harpers' torches, walking along a sharp incline where road falls away, toeing the line between shadow and light.

ShadowCreatures_68.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_68.text: Keep in the light! You - who the hells are you?!
ShadowCreatures_68.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player has leroy jenkins'd into the scene by jumping off a high precipice from above, landing amidst the Harpers, who jump back in surprise, and regroup away from the player, so that the player is in a more 'standard' dialogue position at the end of the node. Lassandra gathers her wits immediately after her intiial shock and addresses the Harpers, afraid they've leapt into the darkness. Points weapon at player .NodeContext: 'Keep in the light' is to her HArpers. Address is to player. She points her sword at the player, ready to strike in an instant if necessary.

ShadowCreatures_67.speaker: Harper Lassandra
ShadowCreatures_67.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sword still pointed at player.

Dead_HarperScout_000_15.speaker: Narrator
Dead_HarperScout_000_15.text: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

Dead_HarperScout_000_18.speaker: Narrator
Dead_HarperScout_000_18.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

Dead_HarperScout_000_19.speaker: Narrator
Dead_HarperScout_000_19.text: *The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

AD_HarperScout_000_WrongWarning_0.speaker: Harper Lassandra
AD_HarperScout_000_WrongWarning_0.text: That's not the way - come back!

AD_HarperScout_003_WrongWarning_0.speaker: Harper Karrow
AD_HarperScout_003_WrongWarning_0.text: You turned around? Last Light's this way.

BridgePoint_003_0.speaker: Harper Karrow
BridgePoint_003_0.text: Made it. Go speak to the boss.

BridgePoint_003_1.speaker: Harper Karrow
BridgePoint_003_1.text: What're you waiting for? Head into the light.

BridgePoint_001_1.speaker: Harper Meygan
BridgePoint_001_1.text: Didn't think I'd live to see this place again.
